PrecisRegulations Amending Certain CANADA BORDER SERVICES AGENCY REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) by correcting inconsistencies identified by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations between the English and French versions of Regulations enforced by the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA), and by adding references to that Agency in another, as follows: . - CCRFTA Verification of Origin Regulations [ss. 6.(1)] - Reporting of Exported Goods Regulations [par. 15(b)] - Customs Bonded Warehouses Regulations [par. 3(4)(e) and 8(2)(c)]
